reviewText: I enjoyed the four movies included in this set.  They were down to earth, the acting was outstanding, and the story line was touching.  I enjoyed this one so much I looked for more to view.

We decided to include this in a package of 5 videos which we plan to pass on to our grandchildren to watch with their parents as a way of expressing our values. These are entertaining, but also express what is important in life.

Elinor and Dennis Skeate

http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B0028OH59A/ref=cm_cr_rev_prod_img
These movies were just wonderful.  I truly enjoyed being able to get a multi-movie pack like this with good family movies.

My husband and I enjoy Hallmark movies very much.  They always seem to have interesting human-interest stories, and leave us feeling good at the end.  This collection of movies was wonderful, and what a bargain this was!  The video arrived in excellent condition, and very quickly!  Would recommend to everyone!
This series is an excellent value for the entire family. We enjoyed each movie. It was shipped in a timely manner and the CD is of good quality.

Another set of great movies to see, I have seen Thicker Than Water so many times and continue to watch, I loved the Angel In The Family as well, Meredith Baxter is great in this movie, it's sad but great at the same time.....Fielders Choice with Chad Lowe is great, he takes in his Nephew after his sister is killed in an accident, he ends up sending him to live with his aunt but realizes how much him and his dog really miss him so he goes back to get him and brings him back home....... Ordinary Miracles is great have seen it a few times where the judge takes in this troubled young girl and ends up hiring a landscaper that ends up being the girls father.......Another great one to watch.....

These are excellent family friendly films that try to teach lessons. Each film is somewhat short (shorter than full length movies) but well worth the money.

Four movies along different themes on one disc and all of them good wholesome entertainment dealing with some real life problems but having a positive outcome.  Good for both children and adults, not having to worry about bad language or suggestive or immoral scenes.  Congratulations Hallmark.  Highly recommended.  I had to cancel my satellite service because my spouse has a brain injury from stroke activity.  All the negative news, shows promoting victim mentality, and continually violent and immoral programs would immediately imprint his mind and keep him agitated.  These Hallmark movies don't disturb him so I will be purchasing more Hallmark DVD's for when we choose to watch TV.

I received several Hallmark movies for Christmas because friends know that I enjoy many of the Hallmark movies.  But when I watched the movies I was extremely disappointed.
When I watched the movies on TV they were captioned in English for the hearing impaired.  I am one of those with this problem because I am going deaf.  NONE of the Hallmark
movies on DVD that I received have subtitles in English for the hearing impaired.  I am extremely disappointed in Hallmark.  I expected better of them.

All the movies are good and enjoyable.  But these I may not be able to enjoy for long.
Hallmark made for TV movies are a great source of family intertainment. There are four great movies on each disk, making it a great value.
This was a great collection. All of the movies in this set were entertaining, moving, at times suspenseful, and definitely something the entire family could enjoy. That's always nice.

The product was like new. Very pleased with the whole process!
I appreciate how easy they made this for me and how timely it was.
Haven't watched all yet, but know it's great.

I bought this set because I was taken in by the pictures of the movies and the actors/tresses and the fact that it was Hallmark.  but I was disappointed in that I could only view 1 of the movies.  The themes created problems for me in that I do not believe in the dead coming back to life.  I think Hallmark could provide better description so that folk can make a more informed choice.  I would have never purchased this set if I had known the content of the stories in more depth.  So I had to stop watching some of them (when ghosts appear). So if you have the same beliefs as I do, then don't waste time or money on this package.

Four sweet and inspirational holiday films, and each and every one of them is worth buying individually -- AND, you can get them together in this set for what amounts to less than the cost of one! I can watch Christmas movies all year long for a little feeling of happiness that only the holidays can bring.

Hallmark movies never disappoint me, and this package is a deal I can't pass up!
I liked the movies. They were sweet and inspirational. Nice to be able to relax and watch without worrying what children might see. :)

I love the movie Thicker Than Water and when I had to replace it, I was thrilled to find four clean, family movies for little more than the price of one!!!  My lucky day!!

I have been collecting Hallmark Hall of Fame movies & some other Hallmark movies lately.  What attracted my attention was the cheap price!  This is four movies - quite different in genrae, but all good movies.  Thicker than Water is a modern-day western in which a city girl finds what could be her half-sister that her father did not know exited when he died.  There is a land-squabble with a neighbor over water rights & the fate of a group of wild horses.  The Colt is a few-days on the battlefield of the Civil War.  Ordinary Miracles is a city-story in which a teenager is brought to the court by foster parents because she has gotten in some trouble, small thefts are blamed on her.  The court has no place to send her except juvenile jail.  The judge decides to take the girl into her own home & finds the girl's father & hires him to do some landscaping on her property.  Fielder's Choice, I have not viewed yet.  It looks like an 8 year old autistic boy is baby-sat by his uncle Chad Lowe, because the child's mother is an artist & has a gallery showing on a very busy weekend at work for the uncle.  I have to be in a certain "mind-set" to watch movies like this.  I do enjoy them when I watch them.  The synopsis on the case says "The uncomplicated life of a promising ad exec is disrupted when he's given custody of his autistic nephew.  But as one learns from the other, two hearts open up and a future of unexpected possibilities await."

Some actors/actresses I really enjoy are in these movies: Melissa Gilbert, Jaclyn Smith, Lindsay Wagner & Chad Lowe.  For the cheap price & that it only takes the same shelf space as one standard DVD case is an added bonus.
There are four movies in this set of Hallmark movies.  Great for family viewing.
